医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了促进癌细胞有效摄取 ASO 的新方法反义寡核苷酸 (ASO) 是下一代药物，可以通过阻止基因中有害信息的传递来治疗疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-reveals-novel-approach-to-promote-efficient-uptake-of-ASOs-into-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-reveals-novel-approach-to-promote-efficient-uptake-of-ASOs-into-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77f08a22-f700-4beb-aef5-7c11875ecf1b Tue, 16 Apr 2024 13:18:41 -0400 Study reveals novel approach to promote efficient uptake of ASOs into cancer cells
创新的测试方案减少了 IBD 诊断的漫长等待时间一项新的研究发现，疑似炎症性肠病（IBD）患者可以受益于更好的检测方案，从而减少可能不必要的结肠镜检查的需要和漫长的等待。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Innovative-testing-protocol-reduces-the-lengthy-wait-for-IBD-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Innovative-testing-protocol-reduces-the-lengthy-wait-for-IBD-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d96c5a53-2914-4165-aac6-4de503b16c77 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 07:57:55 -0400 Innovative testing protocol reduces the lengthy wait for IBD diagnosis
新柳叶刀乳腺癌委员会：改变全球乳腺癌护理新成立的《柳叶刀》乳腺癌委员会今天发布了有关改善全球乳腺癌护理的调查结果和建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/New-Lancet-Commission-on-Breast-Cancer-Transforming-breast-cancer-care-globally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/New-Lancet-Commission-on-Breast-Cancer-Transforming-breast-cancer-care-globally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f8a89cf-7150-411b-9ceb-670be8b6846a Tue, 16 Apr 2024 07:53:08 -0400 New Lancet Commission on Breast Cancer: Transforming breast cancer care globally
诉讼指控奥巴马医改计划转换计划针对低收入消费者周五提起的一项范围广泛的诉讼概述了一项赚钱计划，大型保险销售机构呼叫中心通过该计划将人们纳入平价医疗法案计划或改变他们的承保范围，所有这些都未经他们的许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Lawsuit-alleges-Obamacare-plan-switching-scheme-targeted-low-venue-consumers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Lawsuit-alleges-Obamacare-plan-switching-scheme-targeted-low-venue-consumers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8c31e59-bbd3-46af-983a-ae26af7419d1 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 07:02:54 -0400 Lawsuit alleges Obamacare plan-switching scheme targeted low-income consumers
保守派法官在堕胎问题上给共和党政客制造麻烦多年来，反对堕胎的人一直在法院进行活动，以阻止人们获得生殖保健服务。上周在亚利桑那州，反堕胎阵营的胜利引起了该州及其他地区共和党候选人的政治反弹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Conservative-justices-stir-trouble-for-Republican-politicians-on-abortion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Conservative-justices-stir-trouble-for-Republican-politicians-on-abortion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b3bbcc7-61e6-469c-bc16-dea66c77c424 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 07:01:10 -0400 Conservative justices stir trouble for Republican politicians on abortion
加州卫生工作者可能面临25美元最低工资法的猛醒如果医院和其他医疗保健提供者继续削减工作时间和福利，近 50 万受益于加州全国领先的 25 美元最低工资法的卫生工作者可能会猛然醒悟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/California-health-workers-may-face-rude-awakening-with-2425-minimum-wage-law.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/California-health-workers-may-face-rude-awakening-with-2425-minimum-wage-law.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5603be0-4f01-40b2-bd7a-34a2eaf9c6c4 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 06:55:54 -0400 California health workers may face rude awakening with $25 minimum wage law
配偶心血管疾病与抑郁症风险增加有关吗？受影响者的配偶在此类事件后是否更有可能变得抑郁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Is-spousal-cardioangio-disease-linked-with-an-increased-risk-for-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Is-spousal-cardioangio-disease-linked-with-an-increased-risk-for-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33728b15-8544-43aa-93af-a745595e4c28 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 06:48:00 -0400 Is spousal cardiovascular disease associated with an increased risk for depression?
新研究发现中国各地区生育率持续下降总和生育率的时间趋势并调查总和生育率的区域变化和差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/China-faces-continuing-fertility-drop-across-all-regions-new-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/China-faces-continuing-fertility-drop-across-all-regions-new-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ab96f0f-aef7-47a7-b52e-53594f964c5d Tue, 16 Apr 2024 06:09:00 -0400 China faces continuing fertility drop across all regions, new study finds

谷歌 Gemini 和 Bard 通过眼科委员会考试两个人工智能聊天机器人在眼科委员会考试中的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Google-Gemini-and-Bard-pass-the-oathmology-board-examination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Google-Gemini-and-Bard-pass-the-oathmology-board-examination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2fb6620-1630-4784-af51-e85556971560 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 05:25:00 -0400 Google Gemini and Bard pass the ophthalmology board examination
